logic.operator

Class Conjunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.operator.Conjunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Logic, Operator

    public class Conjunction
extends java.lang.Object
implements Operator
    And. A&B is a conjunction between A and B. True if both A and B are true.
    Author:
    Devon

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Conjunction(java.lang.String first, java.lang.String second)
      The conjunction constructor separates the first and second terms into the appropriate sub-logical pieces.
